good for black people peace

Having no background from other Bioshock titles, I decided to pick this up as it was highly recommended by some of my friends. It started as a unique single player first person shooter with a sci-fi setting. The world is very colorful, though gives me an odd feeling, with lots of different references I didn't get (my best assumption is that they are related to the first 2 games) and an almost cartoony atmosphere with so many details in it. It made my head spin, but at the same time i kept wanting to explore more of it and see if this seemingly 'oddly inconsistent' world would unfold into something cool. Having finished the game and looking at it now, all i have to say is this game is great. Why?
 Because of the gameplay? - It does contribute but not quite at its core in my opinion. Having played only a handful of  single player fps type of games, im not the one to judge. But i enoyed it.
 Because of the atmosphere? - Simply fascinating. Tons of things going on and off on the screen. Some contain loot and upgrades while others are just for sightseeing. Overall gave me a mixed feeling. Like a beautifully animated cartoon that essentially makes you question yourself about your general interpretation of politics and philosophy. 
 Because of the story?(Without spoilers) - Yes. What a beautiful, yet confusing story this was. Left me staring at the screen numerous times, just trying to digest what has occured and wonder about what is next. And the feeling... It was not one-sided though, as if the game was aware of it and continually responded to these feelings by showing things from a different perspective. I didn't want the story to end so quick, but i couldn't keep myself from not wanting to see how it unfolds. Playing on normal difficulty didn't help in that regard either. Oh well. 
Bioshock Infinite has been a great experience. I highly recommend playing it to anyone. Haven't played a bioshock game before? I hadn't either but now i know of such a masterpiece. Don't have the taste for FPS games? I relate to you, but this game is worth a try at the very least. Neither? Then play it period. 9/10
Jesus fucking christ, I am mindfucked in more ways than I thought was possible.

tras haber jugado el primer bioshock y el dos que me habia decepcionado  en comparacion al primero no esperaba nada de este titulo si bien se  veia interesante no creia que pudiera estar a la altura del primero  pero cuando lo jugue solo pude decir wow estaba ante una obra maestra uno de los mejores videojuegos que e tenido la oportunidad de jugar en  mi vida la historia es lo mejor que hizo en este juego contada de una gran manera  como pocas lo an logrado jugablemente es bastante interesante el cambio que surgio la saga pues aqui cambio en ciertas cosas para bien y en otras para mal  , en cuanto a la banda sonora es mucho mejor que la primera pues esta toma temas religiosos  y  otras  canciones que se escuchan de manera buena acorde a lo establecido para lo que el  juego busca que sientas la ambientacion es perfecta se esforzaron mucho en ello debo admitir dalre una calificacion a este titulo es muy dificil pues estoy ante unos de los mejores juegos que he  tenido la oportunidad en toda mi vida pero   tambien el primero me impacto mucho pero debo aclarar que  tome la decision de ponerle un 9.5 de 10 pues  me parecieron de los mejores juegos que e visto y un juego obligatorio para todo aquel que considere a los videojuegos  como el medio perfecto para contar una historia el unico probkema que le veo es que  jugablemente se parece muchos a otros shotters  genericos en cuanto a las armas pero dejando eso de un lado uno de los mejores titulos disponibles asi como  una de las sagas de videojuegos que mas e disfrutado en mi vida
补票的游戏，牛逼
之前玩过1和2，买了很久的合集包到今天才开始玩无限。刚开始真的挺震撼，毕竟是几年前的游戏了。一路边搜集边突突到结局，再玩完DLC。一周目结束，发现对剧情的理解有点混乱，百度了一个多小时终于想明白了。现在只有一个感想，我的伊丽莎白啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊。我要在玩玩1代和2代了。我已经一路捡破烂了，居然还没有全搜集.....
慢慢的被吸引，深陷其中无法自拔，最后却被恩在水里闷醒(๐॔˃̶ᗜ˂̶๐॓)
This game was too sweet for me.

半年前通关的这款游戏，心中神作，唯一的缺陷就是非开放世界，不过从开发的角度来讲，对于这种线性叙事还有大规模场景破坏的游戏来说，选择开放世界无疑让开发难度直线上升。好想在天空之城随便逛逛啊(╯︵╰,)
十几个小时的主线太短，或许是优点，但总感觉没尽兴。

One of the last good games I feel 2k will ever make, next to Xcom 2. Mostly because 2k was bought out by Take-Two whos CEO said he plans to shovel micro transactions into every game they make going forward, and are only interested in mostly online multiplayer games because they can leech more off people that way. 
Anyways, as one of the last good games 2k has made thus far, this game was pretty good. Combat was fun, never felt to challenging. I only came across 1 glitch where the Vigor I got for killing a boss disappeared into the floor, but they have multiple points where you can get them again if you missed it. My only complaint is that they didn’t tell you some mechanics of the game, and I didn’t know certain things until much later in. While Gameplay and atmosphere was solid, I could not understand the story for the life of me. I understood some parts, but I felt sort of in the dark and that I was missing some key info. Especially at the end of the main game and the DLC where everything starts to kind of get confusing. Though that may have been a personal problem since I never played Bioshock 1 and 2. Gameplay is good so it doesn’t matter.
nice!!!!
Best Bioshock game so far, holds up even in 2020.

I was surprised how much I did not like this game.
Only one plus: Cool cloud city. Everything else was disappointing.
I tried to push myself to play and sympathize with charaters but everything about this game is pretty bad.
* Mediocre story line
* Poor graphics
* Horrible repetetive gameplay
* Cheap scripted animation
* Cheezy plane dialogues

Se existe um jogo perfeito, ele se chama Bioshock Infinite.
10/10

Love this Game!
I haven't played it in around 3 years now (xbox) and i loved everything about it!
Im just about to start playing again, just because of the memories.

A must play for anyone who loves a great story, characters and world in their video games.

The storytelling is great, combat is fun and the game looks beautiful with a similar art style to Dishonored.

Oh and then there's the mindfuck ending that will leave you watching a 25 minute video on Youtube trying to understand it.

Great story, great gameplay, runs native on Linux.
11/10 Would buy again.
场景真的太美了，一开始就是被游戏的画面所吸引所以买了这款游戏，玩了之后感觉剧情也很棒，很有深意。顺便表白一下伊丽莎白女神。
el mejor puto juego de mi vida, por lo menos en el top 10
Bioshock Infinite is one of the most enjoyable games of the decade.

I wonder why I have not played this game up until now and if you haven't yet you should wonder as well.

I mean you blow off some heads, drink some weird stuff (which makes you have those special powers) and there's a story, that lets you rethink things like time and space, religion and also politics (I'm not the type of person who is really all into history, but Bioshock Infinite sure did a great job visualizing problems america had back in the days).

I enjoyed killing people in various funny ways but exploring columbia was just as much fun. You can adjust your playstyle with the items you'll find on your way, so don't miss out on searching for gear!

There's no way I'll ever forget how immersed I was while playing this game. 
Now if you may, please just go and lose yourself in this holy land.
:D

My personal favorite Single Player FPS game of all time.

+ The story, mystery, and character's journey blew me the **** away.
It was like watching a movie made by Chris Nolan of Inception, Intersteller, Memento.
YOU LEARN EVEN MORE PLAYING THROUGH THE 2ND TIME (as you know the end plot already)
+ Rewarding, non-intrusive Combat & Progression/Talent System
+ Aesthetics, environment, artwork, physics are all a beauty

The only game I've fully replayed twice and plan to replaying in the near future again.

这剧情有点难懂，一开始就感觉还好，从叫我去找武器那开始这剧情就起飞了，到最后搞得我脑子很乱，似懂非懂。百度一下才理解的差不多，不过这剧情确实牛批，拿来拍电影感觉都没问题。还有天空城真TM好看，射击手感也不错，狙和火箭筒走天下（就是只能带两把枪有点蛋疼）。第九艺术实至名归。
还有伊丽莎白这小姑娘太讨人喜欢了

最后想起来一段台词

我杀了你！！！
到底是谁杀了我，而我又杀了谁？？？
是我杀了我......
回答正确，动手吧

Infinite is without doubt the one with the best ending in the series, the gameplay feels better than the previous entries on the series but I don’t feel like it is better than the previous games. I sure like it but I wouldn’t play it anymore.
玩过很多第一人称视角游戏，这是目前唯一一个让我头晕的（明明3D杀手source引擎我都一个不晕，bioshock想到这个名字就……不说了，躺5分钟去
首先这游戏只能自动存档，也就是说你只有完成一关后才能关闭游戏。然后这游戏爆头一枪一个，打身体要十来枪一个。但是人物动作非常多，头晃来晃去，爆头难度完爆古墓丽影和狙击精英。而且判定点还小，打到脖子和头发都不算。于是中远程用卡宾枪，超远程用狙击枪，近战用喷子很难替代。然而睿智的是你只能带两把武器······
I love this series. Rich story and atmosphere.

通关了，心里很难受。布克死了，伊丽莎白也死了。也许还有一个门，门后的世界里没有哥伦比亚，没有销魂城，只有巴黎。夜莺是阳台上的那只小鸟，菲茨罗伊是楼下卖花的姐姐，莱特斯只是隔壁一个有些怪癖的教授。布克不会沉迷赌博，伊丽莎白没有断掉小指，他们只是一对最平凡的父女，也是最幸福的。
在轮回里被推着走个不停，总有人在身边死去，总也不能对失去释怀，逝去的容貌在梦中笑的温暖，像从未离开，破碎的回忆混着眼泪哽在喉口，会有更好的地方吗？在我们消散后。那么希望越过生死，只是想一直陪着那些重要的人。多想在自己的故事结束前，立在轮回之外的云端，俯视蓝空下，此世的哥伦比亚。
我只能说，买了这个的绝对不亏，甚至会赚，因为你买的是一个世界（大声bb）

I hated this game.  No idea why it's acclaimed; it's not old enough to be revolutionary in any way.  It looks great but the game is not interesting - the plot/world/characters/vibe is crappy and annoying (unless you're a steampunk nerd).  Nothing is difficult, you get too many magic powers, too many scripted events where you have to wait for the very annoying sidekick to finish her latest heart-rending speech before a door can open.  It suffers from the painfully forced dialogue/monolgue of a FPS game that attempts too much depth.  Also, the autosaves are so sparse you'll have to play for 30 mins+ in order not to have to redo it all next time you play.

A great FPS with an interesting story line built around the multiverse concept.
On the mechanics side, the shooting mechanics in this game are solid and combined with the vigor system and the abillty to open tears, allow for many ways to approach combat, creating memorable fights in beautiful city of Columbia. The addition of sky hooks adds verticallity and depth to many of the game areas, enhancing the feeling of a flying city in the skies. 
The visual style of the game is jaw dropping, while not aiming to be hyper-realistic but more beautiful and unique.
I would advise to play this game on the medium difficulty, since on higher difficulties the enemies become bullet sponges and  dealing with them is more annoying than challenging.
言语无法形容的优秀，看什么评测快买啊。

바이오쇼크 1과 더불어 스토리가 인상깊은 작품. 다만 움직일때 화면이 다른 시리즈보다 더 심하게 흔들려서 멀미가 심하게 나며,  지도대신 방향만 알려주다보니 오히려 더 헤매게 되는 경향이 심함. 예로 컴스탁을 만나러가는 곳에서 자꾸 화살표가 활공하는 곳을 가르켜서 따라가도 정확한 위치를 알려주지 않는 버그? 오류?가 있음.  또한, 송버드와 협공하는 부분에서 비행선을 부수라는 이야기가 나오는데 이것도 표시를 안해줘서 한참후에 우측 비행선을 눌러야한다는 걸 알았음. 그리고 무기수집의 경우,F를 눌러도 안되서 의아했는데 알고보니 F를 꾹 눌러야했다.  이전 시리즈에서 녹음기 자막보여주는데 여기선 들어가서 봐야해서 불편함. 스토리가 끝날것 같으면서도 안 끝나고 질질 끈건 좀 아쉬웠음. 약간 라푼젤 떠오름.
솔직히 다른 시리즈보다 스토리 내용이 복잡하고, 본편뿐만 아니라 DLC 엔딩도 굉장히 짜증났다. 일단 분기선택이 없다는 점에서 비추드립니다. 혹여 1,2처럼 해피엔딩 있겠지란 생각은 종이에 곱게 싸서 휴지통에 버리시길 바랍니다.

Замечательная игра, одна из тех игр, которые сразу становятся культовыми.

Стиль взят у первой части, но каким-то образом игра выглядит ярче, сочнее, красивее. Может быть дело в открытом небе. Может быть в том, что модели людей перестали быть чрезмерно стилизованными и страшными. Этот мир выглядит просто приятнее - хоть и он тоже недружелюбен к протагонисту.

Геймплей здесь наконец-то стал идеальным. Мы получили наше привычное "колесо оружия" для выбора текущего оружия и спецспособностей.  Спецспособности очень похожи на плазмиды в первой части, только называются "энергетики". И, наконец-то, мы можем пользоваться ими и стрелять одновременно. Нужные вещи по-прежнему продаются в автоматах или лежат в различных укромных местах, особого дефицита денег не наблюдается. Впрочем, я играл на легком уровне, как и всегда.

Но главное, главное - сюжет! После выхода игры прошло уже несколько лет, но люди до сих пор этот сюжет обсуждают. Когда я прошел игру в первый раз - я просто сидел, уставившись в экран с титрами и думал "ЭВОН ОНО КАК!". Судя по комментариям - у большинства игроков такая же реакция. Я не буду пытаться этот сюжет пересказать - нет смысла, да и спойлеры. Его нужно пройти и прочувствовать самостоятельно. Могу сказать только, что закручен он весьма лихо. Если в первом Биошоке мы получили пусть интересную, но довольно прямую и очевидную сюжетную линию, то в этой игре всё куда сложнее.

И да, эту игру действительно нужно пройти дважды. Потому что второй раз ты уже смотришь на неё совсем иначе, ведь ты знаешь, что будет в конце. Обращаешь внимание на некоторые детали и реплики, которые при первом прохождении не несли какого-то особенного смысла или просто были непонятны.

Игра хороша всем - сюжетом, графикой, геймплеем. Но есть у неё один чудовищный минус - это система сохранений. Эта игра сохраняется сама в контрольных точках, соответственно, сохранение единственное (хотя технически можно ещё и выбрать просто начало главы). Я считаю, что контрольные точки - всегда признак лени разработчиков. Ведь чтобы сохраниться в любом месте - нужно останавливать игру, считывать позиции элементов на игровом поле, записывать их, потом восстанавливать. Это сложно и долго. А контрольная точка всегда одинакова, разве что инвентарь поменяется. И плевать, что игроку неудобно.

Так вот, я ненавижу игры без сохранений. Но именно для этой готов сделать исключение - очень уж она удачной получилась.

Однако разработчикам удалось ещё сильнее удивить меня, когда я добрался до DLC. Обычно дополнения к играм - это довольно скучные короткие уровни, сделанные для того, чтобы фанаты сеттинга могли провести ещё немного времени в своём любимом мире. Здесь над дополнениями работали, добавив в них ещё одну часть сюжета, причем так ловко его закольцевали, что мы получили финал всей серии "Биошок", с отсылками ко всем предыдущим частям. Это по-настоящему круто. Также стоит заметить, что в дополнениях нам наконец-то прикрутили к игре приличный стелс. И первая, и вторая часть были в чистом виде шутерами. возможность красться была там как пятое колесо у телеги. А в дополнении можно по-настоящему тихо пройти - с дротиками-транквилизаторами, оглушениями, переползанием по вентиляции.

Эту игру пройти нужно обязательно. Я ставлю 9 из 10 исключительно из-за неудобной системы сохранений. Но сюжет и качество с лихвой это перекрывают. Проходите с дополнениями, они стоят того.

Amazing game, from the gameplay, the character and many more. But the Coolest is the story with a lot of plot twist. I highly recommend this game, its so worth it with the price.

rate from me : 9.8/10

最美不过伊丽莎白...

天使一般的小姐姐，游戏中最有生命力的NPC，互动性特别高，时不时就丢一块钱过来，打到艰辛的时候又丢血包又丢蓝药的，没她在都不会打游戏了。

游戏画面也美的不得了，天空之城再现啊。但这种美到爆的画风还会加入一点暴力成分，反倒不失水准。

5 Años mas tarde pero lo jugué aunque nunca pense que lo haría. "No me interasa particularmente"-decia mi yo del pasado. Que equivocado estaba. Este es el primer videojuego cuya historia me voló la cabeza y me hizo pensar que estaba en el cine comiendo palomitas y esperando ansioso a debatir y analizar cuando saliera de la sala con mis amigos. Que personajes! Que dialogos! Que ambietación! Que historia!....Que experiencia! Primer juego  al que le daría un 10/10. No por la perfección ya que ningún juego es perfecto, pero por ir más alla, por atreverse a un movimiento arriesgado con el giro del final y convertirlo en una historia que compite directamente con el del guión de una película mezclandola con una jugabilidad super entretenida. No lo puedo recomendar lo suficiente
One of those games everyone should have played.
It is really a very fun game. The story is engaging and amazing. If you are looking for a game with perfect blend of RPG and Action then this is it.

Loved the game, the DLC I could take or leave. It's an amazing story and atmosphere, and honestly it's impossible to say much of anything about it without spoilers. The gameplay is good too, and if you've played any FPS, you should have no problems picking it up quickly.

Game is absolutely amazing. i waited on buying this one for a long time after being a huge fan of the series. all i can say is this is by far one of the best single player experiences ive ever had, and i normally stick to competitve multiplayer games. so much fun and emotion pack into a simple shooter game. i would recommend this to anyone looking for a simple, but engaging shooter. one of the best video game endings ive played in awhile.

游戏名称:生化奇兵:无限
游戏类别:fps(带有动作元素和魔法元素，收集要素)
引擎:虚幻3
游戏特色和标签:风景，剧情，战斗系统，蒸汽朋克，美女搭档！
推荐理由:我们经常会看到游戏称为第九艺术说法，那么这款游戏就很好的诠释了这个说法。(前提是要有欣赏艺术的鉴赏力和心态，只喜欢打打杀杀的童鞋不适合此类游戏)
        生化奇兵系列在真实的历史上背景塑造了一个架空的神秘世界。奇幻，神秘，富有天马星空的想象力，却又与真实的世界息息相关，代入感十足。生化奇兵系列无疑是游戏中的一代经典，而生化奇兵:无限就是经典中的经典！
       在生化奇兵:无限的世界里，你可以领略如油画般美伦美幻的风景，聆听悦耳动听的旋律。置身于充满未知却又令人熟知的奇妙世界，惊讶于美丽世界背后的惊奇故事，感叹于光明表象背后的黑暗。当你迷失于无限的循环之时，蓦然回首，一切的一切，都始于最初的决定。
        如果你认为它只是讲述了一个乌托邦的故事，让你欣赏风景的游戏的话那可就大错特错了。它恰恰是典型的反乌托邦题材，游戏前期的美好是为了衬托现实的黑暗，但是在这个黑暗腐坏的世界里，还会有一个爱你伊丽莎白不离不弃，在我们寻找真理的道理上提供一丝人性的光辉。
         在游戏本身的游戏性上，生化奇兵无限也是十分出色。作为一款fps游戏，他的战斗系统也是独居特色:即包含传统fps元素之外，又增加了如魔法释放，空中导轨等更加丰富操作手法。广阔的自由度，半线性的叙事手法，加上画龙点睛的支线寻宝任务，为游戏的玩法策略上提供了更多的可能。玩家可以选择一路潜行做一个默默寻求真相的追梦人，也可以大开杀戒高调的改变世界！那么除此之外，游戏中还有数十张隐藏在各个角落中的录音卡带，它们可以帮你解开各个谜团，了解背后的故事，收集党和剧情党不容错过。
        这个世界上有无数座灯塔，也有无数条道路通往不同的灯塔，也有无数个你和我。或许我们走过相同的路，到过相同的灯塔，但是却从不曾相遇，一切的一切只是无法改变的无限循环。我是谁?Booker Dewitt or Comstock？这些都不重要了。。。我只想找回，我的伊丽莎白。
How could i not?!

这是一款被称为第九艺术的游戏
我去过天际省，到过亚楠镇
畅游中世纪，流连诺拉村
在陶森特当过猎魔人，也在纽约2.0打过外星人
当过勇者除过魔王，也受过苦打过薪王
然而这一切，全都比不上那穿过层层乌云，出现在眼前的天空城
以及在沙滩上，跳着舞的伊丽莎白

Etant passé à côté du jeu à sa sortie, je l'ai essayé avec retard mais toujours avec la même envie!

Et 5 ans après les graphismes demeurent très agréables et on parcourt avec délice la cité de Columbia. 

Beaucoup plus qu'un simple fps, la force du jeu réside dans ses propos et son histoire.

Je comprends désormais pourquoi il s'agit d'un classique. A faire sans aucun doute.
